I have learned that people will always have different opinions in life, but that is fine.  Just because a friend doesn't agree with you doesn't mean you can't be friends.  You should be open with each other and discuss your differences.  The world doesn't need to be any more divided than it already is, and if it turns out you still don't get along with someone after hearing their opinion, you can still be respectful.  Saying mean things to them is bullying, and even though they might look fine on the outside, inside they could be really hurting.
